alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 01 at 10:02AM CST until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Hale, Greene, Marengo and Sumter Counties. .Heavy rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is forecast to occur tonight and Thursday over the Tombigbee River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 57.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday evening and continue rising to 69.3 feet early Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
